passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > section:nth-child(1) > article > section > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > section:nth-child(1) > article > section > div:nth-child(2) > div > article:nth-child(3) > header > a > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > aside:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > ul > li:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)

html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > aside:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > ul > li:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
